attributes.action: Stop Coperforma, and reinstate local ambulance services for patient transport
attributes.background: When patient transport was run by your local ambulance service, they ran on time,were polite, and were medical trained. Since they took over in Sussex their has been nothing but problems.

rejection.details: We're not sure what specific action you would like the Government to take. If you would like all patient transport to be run only by local ambulance services, and not by private contractors, you could start a new petition calling for that.
